title: NIPER Mohali Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Research Associate I Posts
description: National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research (NIPER Mohali) has declared the latest job notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Research Associate I Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.V.Sc, MDS, MD/ MS, M.Pharm, M.E/ M.Tech, and Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NIPER Mohali Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. I...
